title: CSL Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for 02 Nurse Posts
description: The Cochin Shipyards Limited (CSL) has announced the official job notification for 2025. Allotted 02 vacancies for Nurse positions. Those candidates who have completed their GNM can grab this chance and apply for the CSL Recruitment 2025 . Here, we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested and eligible candidates can apply online before the last date of application. If you are looking for more, ...
